song.englishname: I Could Sing Of Your Love Forever

english.segment1: Over the mountains and the sea. Your river runs with love for me. And I will open up my heart. And let the healer set me free. I'm happy to be in the truth. And I will daily lift my hands. For I will always sing. Of when your love came down
english.segment2: (Chorus). I could sing of your love forever. I could sing of your love forever. I could sing of your love forever. I could sing of your love forever
english.segment3: Over the mountains and the sea. Your river runs with love for me. And I will open up my heart. And let the healer set me free. I'm happy to be in the truth. And I will daily lift my hands. For I will always sing. Of when your love came down
english.segment5: Oh, I feel like dancing. This foolishness, I know. But when the world has seen the light. They will dance with joy. Like we're dancing now
